subject: Haptic motors
description_text:
Hi, looking at the VAM pro haptic pedals addons and I am just wondering if
they would come with a uk plug when shipped to the uk? The photo only shows
US style plug. Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Joshua Whinney,  We offer four types of power plugs. For orders shipped to the UK, we will automatically include a UK-standard plug based on the destination country.Â
